scenes.background: You refocused on the urgent task.
scenes.description: I still think we couldve managed without you stepping in.

options.text: Let's move forward and make sure this doesn't happen again.
options.analysis: You chose to focus on future improvement, showing balanced emotional perception and regulation, though social skill could be better.

options.text: I understand your point. Next time, I'll consult before stepping in.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the feedback, showing good self-regulation, but emotional perception and motivation were lower.

options.text: Given the urgency, stepping in was necessary. Let's focus on the outcome.
options.analysis: You justified your actions based on urgency, showing motivation but slightly compromising on self-regulation.
